TopicTitle: EDIT! How do I change the position of a craft through a DLL plugin?

Articles.Content:
EDIT: REWRITTEN

Hey,

Alright so I recently undertook an idea to make something a bit like a stargate, You touch it you move to another one. I need help figuring out to move my craft position to possibly a different gravity well. So when you collide wiht the stargate your position is changed. Help please!

Thanks

SRG

Edited July 5, 2014 by Some_Random_Guy

You can have a look at how HyperEdit does it.

There are also other mods that change a craft position, but I think HyperEdit would be the best way for you to figure it out.
